edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_library.patron

Class PatronDB

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_library.patron.PatronDB

  • public class PatronDB
extends java.lang.Object
    The patron DB uses a custom array-based list to keep track of the patrons that can use the library.
    Author:
    Marcus

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PatronDB()
      The Patron DB constructor constructs a new database of the patron used in the library system.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addNewPatron(java.lang.String id, java.lang.String password, int maxAllowed)
      The add new patron method adds a new patron to the database.
      void cancelAccount(java.lang.String id)
      The cancel account method removes the patron with the given id from the list.
      java.lang.String listAccounts()
      The list accounts method will list the accounts in the database as a string.
      Patron verifyPatron(java.lang.String id, java.lang.String password)
      The verify patron method returns the patron in the list whose id and password match the parameters in the method signature.

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • PatronDB

        public PatronDB()
        The Patron DB constructor constructs a new database of the patron used in the library system.

    • Method Detail

      • verifyPatron

        public Patron verifyPatron(java.lang.String id,
                  java.lang.String password)
        The verify patron method returns the patron in the list whose id and password match the parameters in the method signature.
        Parameters:
        id - the user's id to verify
        password - the user's password to verify
        Returns:
        the patron that was verified

      • listAccounts

        public java.lang.String listAccounts()
        The list accounts method will list the accounts in the database as a string. It is used for testing only.
        Returns:
        users a string representation of all the users in the database

      • addNewPatron

        public void addNewPatron(java.lang.String id,
                java.lang.String password,
                int maxAllowed)
        The add new patron method adds a new patron to the database.
        Parameters:
        id - a user's id
        password - a user's password
        maxAllowed - the maximum number of books the user can check out

      • cancelAccount

        public void cancelAccount(java.lang.String id)
        The cancel account method removes the patron with the given id from the list. It returns any books that the patron has checked out to the inventory.
        Parameters:
        id - the user id to remove from the database
